name: Kidou Senshi Gundam: Gundam vs. Gundam NEXT PLUS
name_original: Kidou Senshi Gundam: Gundam vs. Gundam NEXT PLUS
description:
Kidou Senshi Gundam: Gundam vs. Gundam NEXT PLUS is an action game. It was originally released in 2012.
You can play Kidou Senshi Gundam: Gundam vs. Gundam NEXT PLUS on PSP.
